header.tagline: Senior Sales Development Leader – B2B & SaaS

summary: Proven B2B sales leader with over 10 years of experience in SaaS, driving $1.2M+ deals and optimizing sales teams for maximum efficiency.

bullets.text: Conducted quantitative and qualitative analysis to identify $4M in new business opportunities in LATAM, resulting in a 15% increase in market penetration.
Cultivated strategic relationships resulting in a $200K deal with a major cosmetic brand, contributing to a 10% increase in annual revenue.
Led a team of 3 BDRs, optimizing prospecting, leading to 35% pipeline growth and a 20% increase in lead conversion rates.
Led and coached 8 SDRs across LATAM and U.S., achieving 112% average quota attainment.
Developed sales playbooks and performance tracking, increasing team productivity by 25%.
Optimized workflows, reducing SDR response time by 40%.
Sourced a $1.2M deal with a U.S. rental car company, exceeding quarterly targets.
Achieved 137% of quota for 5 consecutive quarters, leading top sales performance.
Led a team of SDRs, generating 50 new opportunities, increasing pipeline by 28%.
Maintained 98% quota attainment across team, driving high-performance culture.
Sourced $880K deal with U.S. stadium, enhancing company portfolio.
Developed call scripts and lead qualification criteria, improving engagement by 22%.

additionalExperience: Account Executive at Strategic Properties (Mar 2014 - Sep 2017) and BDR at ProspectHunter (Feb 2018 - Dec 2018)
